title: So, i got banned for 14 days?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
So, yesterday i was playing as panth top against an olaf (draft pick), i preety much lost the early game duo to a really stupid decision of me and my midlaner starting with the enemys red buff and coming for an unsuccesfull gank at mid.

So I got preety much outfarmed and outtraded by the enemy olaf and i got frustrated really fast especially because olaf was in a perfect spot for my shyvana jungler to gank. 

**But anyways this is not why i am here and starting this disscusion, rather i can not find a real reason to why i got banned since i was just having a bad game and the feeding was not intentional. My stats at the end were 2/15/6 and we even won this game which was just a draft pick... **

This is literally the first game this season that i was doing so bad and making this kind of stupid stuff as you can see here: http://matchhistory.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUW1/3167238592/98566871?tab=builds&participant=2

(that 7 tear of godesses were bought because i thought the enemys would finish the game already and having those 7 items would show my frustration at the end... :^)) 

And now i am even more scared of getting permabanned if i play bad games, especially since i invested really, really much money into my account (talking about +300€) 

my acc link (op.gg): https://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=SexyBabe69

replies.body:
> i was just having a bad game and the feeding was not intentional.

So, do I have permission to post your chat logs here?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=lrNhJ3e9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-05-04T17:13:59.340+0000)
>
> So, do I have permission to post your chat logs here?

oh please {{summoner:11}}  him!
He already did by calling his bluff. The guy's not going to give his permission because he knows Tantram's on a whole 'nother level.
Tantram sees all. Knows all. Smites all.

> (that 7 tear of godesses were bought because i thought the enemys would finish the game already and having those 7 items would show my frustration at the end... :^))

Sure and you kept them for 9 full minuts before reselling ? sorry but keeping these tears for 9 minuts IS trolling and intentionnally making you useless. 

https://i.imgur.com/g0klAl1.png

You were already quite useless with your score, but this was not a bannable offense. Making you even more useless by selling everything and buying tears ? This is worth a ban. 

Next time you will respect your allies choice of playing the game till it ends and you will not throw away your stuff for useless items.

OP claims X.

OP willingly provides documents that shows X is false.

????

Profit? Maybe?
You did have those tears for about 9 minutes. Props to the rest of your team for pulling out the win.

> feeding was not intentional.

Three deaths after you sold all your items to buy nothing but tears can't be anything else.
